name: Jarvis Orchestrator
description: Primary AI assistant coordinating all Jarvis agents and handling direct user interactions.

skills.name: Task Delegation
skills.description: Delegates tasks to specialized agents based on type and priority

skills.name: User Interaction
skills.description: Handles direct conversations with Mike via messaging platforms

skills.description: Maintains session context and memory across interactions

skills.name: File Operations
skills.description: Read, write, and edit files in the workspace

skills.name: Shell Execution
skills.description: Execute shell commands for system operations

skills.name: Web Research
skills.description: Search and fetch web content for research tasks

skills.name: Code Generation
skills.description: Write and modify code following Engineering Commandments

triggers.direct_message: User sends message via configured channel
